mapper.select: SELECT id, statecode, finalaccess, reportnum, totalreportnum, rn FROM ( SELECT id, statecode, finalaccess, reportnum, totalreportnum, rownum as rn FROM ( SELECT * FROM( SELECT id,statecode,finalaccess, reportnum, totalreportnum FROM admin_member_reportstate_2 UNION SELECT id,statecode,finalaccess, reportnum, totalreportnum FROM admin_member_reportstate_1 UNION SELECT id,statecode,finalaccess, reportnum, totalreportnum FROM admin_member_reportstate_0 ) ORDER BY totalreportnum DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND statecode <> '0' ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

SELECT reportid,reportcontent,reporter,reported, rbrno, rfrno, rbid, reportdate, reportnum, statecode, finalaccess FROM( SELECT reportid,reportcontent,reporter,reported, rbrno, rfrno, rbid, reportdate, reportnum, statecode, finalaccess, rownum as rn FROM ( SELECT report.reportid, report.reportcontent, report.reporter, report.reported, report.rbrno, report.rfrno, report.rbid, report.reportdate, member.statecode, member.finalaccess, member.reportnum FROM report INNER JOIN member ON report.reported = member.id WHERE member.id = #{id} AND report.reportstate = 2 ORDER BY report.reportid DESC ) WHERE rownum<=#{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn>(#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE statecode <> '0'
SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT member.id,count(*),member.statecode FROM member INNER JOIN report ON report.reported = member.id WHERE report.reportstate = 2 GROUP BY member.id,member.statecode )
SELECT count(*) FROM report WHERE reportstate = '1'

SELECT title, eventstartdate, eventenddate, contentid, addr1, questioncount FROM ( SELECT title, eventstartdate, eventenddate, contentid, addr1, questioncount, rownum as rn FROM ( SELECT * FROM admin_festa_a UNION SELECT * FROM admin_festa_b ) WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ORDER BY eventstartdate DESC ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM festa WHERE contentid > 0
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE (bno = 1 OR bno = 2) AND bstatecode = 'Y'
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE bno = 3 AND bstatecode= 'Y'

SELECT brno FROM board_reply WHERE brno = #{rbrno}
